name: Rainbow Raindrops
description:
Score as high as you can using the wooden bowl to catch Rainbow Raindrops, to avoid some nasty special raindrops, as well as to maximise your score with good special raindrops too!

There are three separate sizes and colours of the Rainbow Raindrops. Smallest yellow, medium blue and large red!

There are also three special raindrops which should be noted. One which is negative and will block your vision, making it harder to catch raindrops. Two others which are positive, one that doubles points gained thereafter for a number of seconds, and another which slows the speed of all the raindrops for a number of seconds, making it easier to catch the raindrops in time.

The levels go from 1 - 70 and there are new backgrounds to unlock as the levels progress.
